edu.txstate.hearts.gui

Class ConfigurationUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.txstate.hearts.gui.ConfigurationUI

  • public class ConfigurationUI
extends java.lang.Object
    This class displays the initial set up of the game. The user will be allow to enter a name, a level of difficulty and set the end score. This user interface is made up of a JFrame containing 3 ComboBoxes that allow for easy access to information.
    Author:
    Maria Poole, I Gede Sutapa
